meanings.sent1: The crumply paper made it difficult to fold neatly.
meanings.sent2: She wore a crumply shirt that she had forgotten to iron.
meanings.sent3: The crumply map led them on a twisted path through the forest.
meanings.sent4: His crumply face showed years of laughter and smiles.
meanings.sent5: The crumply fabric felt rough against her skin.

meanings.sent1: The old book crumply as he turned the pages.
meanings.sent2: The leaves crumply in the autumn breeze.
meanings.sent3: She crumply her nose in confusion at the strange sight.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to crumply the once smooth surface of the painting.
meanings.sent5: The paper crumply in his hands as he nervously waited.
